SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END VALID_SLS_REP
FROM S21_ORG O ,ORG_FUNC_ROLE_TP OFR WHERE O.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND O.TOC_CD = #tocCd# AND O.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OFR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND O.ORG_FUNC_ROLE_TP_CD = OFR.ORG_FUNC_ROLE_TP_CD AND OFR.SLS_ASG_ELIG_FLG = 'Y' AND OFR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND O.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
